content.detailedDescription: I am now age 78 but when i was about 6 or 7 and messing in the dirt with ants on the dirt dead-end road in  back of the cottage about 10 miles outside of ludington, michigan, i saw a saucer like object flying toward me; it then stopped over hamlin lake and after a second, went back the way it came from the other side of hamlin lake and on perhaps in the direction of lake michigan. it didn't make any noise and i didn't see any windows. it just looked like a flying saucer. the speed was relatively slow and it seemed to stop for a moment over about the middle of the lake there and then reverse course going back in the direction it had come as if to say, "oh, i'm going in the wrong direction" i don't know why i recall this event today as if it happened yesterday. i wish i didn't. i recently saw on t.V. the lake michigan triangle between benton harbor, manitowac and ludington.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I am now age 78 but recall event as if yesterday; playing on dirt road with ants saw saucer flying toward me, stop over hamlin lake and then fly back same route it came. i was alone & then age about 7. why can't i forget this?

content.detailedDescription: Sitting in my living room watching a movie with my parents, wife and daughter, when i saw a bright orange light through the curtains. went out the front door to see what it was. we all saw two reddish orange lights in the sky moving in unison. most of us were excited to see the lights, though my daughter was frightened. unlike lights on an airplane these lights did not blink. thy were about 45 degrees above the horrizon. placing my hand infront of my face as reference i could get four fingers between the two points of light. we bserved the lights for about 30 seconds before being obscured in low cloud cover. my mother noted the time at 8:55 pm. we estimate the lights moved slowly from 30 degrees to 50 degrees ne towards the north. the two lights seemed to have a very slight downward movement. the north most light faded and the second light faded about five seconds later when it reached the same point in the sky. guessing i would say the lights were one to two miles away but very difficult to determine with such heavy clouds. no sounds were heard. we all thought the lights may have been flares attached to parachutes. why someone would do this close to 9 am at night in bad weather seems odd. the unison they moved in also seemed odd and disapeering at the same point in the sky seems strange as well. hopefully someone knows or saw something to better explain my families sighting.
content.summary: Two reddish orange lights passing from east to north at 9 pm maybe flares, but not sure.

content.detailedDescription: i was alone at home just gone into kitchen to make a drink when i noticed a very bright object moving in the sky very far up. it was like nothing i'd ever seen almost diamond shaped with a few colours in it i know the skies very well as i often use my binoculars to stopwatch and this was not any flight path i had ever seen. as it moved over my house i was about to run round to the front when i noticed movement. there were two bright lights six sagging in the sky to the left of where the large object was traveling i watched these move about for a minute or two and then went round the front of the house but the objects had all vanished from view. there was no one around on my estate not a sound the large object made a humming notice but no sound from the smaller lights.
content.summary: Large fast moving object accompanied by two smaller lights

content.detailedDescription:
i was taking random pics of the stars! using my nikon d 40 camera , on a tripod, with a 12 sec. time lapse.
     first, i noticed that things were going across the sky , that would block out the stars. one star at a time! you could not see anything, however, it was more then a twinkling star... they did not dim... they went away for a split second. the direction that they were moving was east to west. there was more then one , because they were not following the same line. but the direction of travel was the same!
     so i aimed at jupiter, orion's sword, plaidies, big dipper, a bright star in the southeast [i do not beleave that it was part of orion } and a red star the might have been mars! after about 45 mins. i came into the house to download. as i was reviewing the photos, i came across the one in question. 
     the first photo is the untouched origional. the second photo will be zoomed and croped, with maybe a little lighting added! i lightened it a bit, to pull out the more distant stars... give a direction that the time lapse pulled the stars.
     this was a pic of the star in the southeast, in the pic it is white, pill shaped. i question the rainbow looping trail, that seems to be in line with the star.  now, i realize that this could be a gnat , but i do not know what would have lit it up! i like to take my pics in the dark. the darker... the better! no flash!
     i would appreciate your ideas as to what this rainbow loopie thing is! also, the neon pink that seem to radiate from the right , lower side of the star. these things do not show up on any of my other pics! 
                                 thamk you, patty smith
content.summary: Something flew around a star in a pic that i took but did not show up in the other 25 pics

content.detailedDescription:
I was at a boarding school in perthshire,just before i was preparing to return home after a term we saw a light outside the dorm room that seemed to be changing colours and there was a very loud buzzing sound, we looked out of the dorm room and the craft hovered between two buildings at about 20 to 40 feet height, the lights git brighter and colours changed, it hovered for a while and then disappeared.
i was drawn to the noise and lights,initially i did not know what it was and thought it was a plane, i was 12! i am now 47 it was no.Plane,i was scared initially then curious, i am ex royal air force and know a lot about planes and know it was a ufo, it was  a saucer configuration with a larger dome on the top. there was windows but they're darkened, i knew i had seen something, i got a shock recently when a ufo sighting i heard about and saw on the internet looked like what i saw and it brought back all the memories of that night.I know they exist .
content.summary: Craft hovering between two buildings at a residential school

content.detailedDescription:
March 2005. approximately 5:30am. outside of workplace in niles, oh, near the intersection of allison and cedar. clear skies. no moon. 

while standing in the parking lot, stargazing with a coworker, a black triangular object appeared directly above after clearing the roof of the building, traveling n/ne. the shape was clearly visible against the starlit, night sky and blanked out stars as it passed in front of them. no lights. no sound. no visible details. at arms' length, when directly above, it measured about 3 inches across the trailing edge and looked asymmetrical. it continued straight, in that direction until passing out of site behind houses in about a minute.
content.summary: Triangular object in flight

content.detailedDescription: It was bright!!
content.summary: Crazy

content.detailedDescription: I saw it then i didn't!!
content.summary: It was a ufo!

content.detailedDescription:
Lima, per���. 1998-2001 (i don't remember the exact date)
21:00 - 23:30 (more or less) 
cloudy night.
open field birthday's party.


it was an uncle's birthday and i was between 7 to 10 years old. i was having fun when my father encouraged me to see up in the sky. he seemed not so impressed as he did not tell anyone else of what was happening at that time. 

he pointed a star that actually was doing circles almost over us. he said,"look at it. it is a ufo." but in spanish. i did not know about what a ufo was but it was astonishing. i was very impressed at the beginning, but after a while i got bored of looking at it because it did not do anything but spinning (flying describing a circle).

i could not figure out if the ufo was actually ascending or just doing circles but after a couple of minutes it seemed to be reaching the clouds. 

i got bored and my neck was hurting me so i relaxed my neck looking the ground. after that, when i looked at the sky again, it was not there anymore. it was a party in an open-field area, but i do not know why my father did not told others to see what we were watching. i was staring the whole time.

i am 22, almost 23 now. even though i have told this story every time i recall it, i have not told this to people who i did not know. now i feel relieved after posting this.
content.summary: A star-like ufo ascending doing circles almost over me

content.detailedDescription:
I was on silver hill road and swann lane, stopped at a red light across from the u.S. census bureau headquarters in suitland, maryland with rite aide to my right. i was updating my facebook status and snapped a picture from within my car (both hands over the steering wheel, on the dashboard) of the rush-hour traffic. i hit the "post" button and preceded straight towards suitland road and checked me facebook status at the next red light across from om suitland high school (silver hill road/sunset lane). 

this is when i discovered the object in the picture hovering low in the sky, later i noticed three odd oval shaped like faces within the red spectrum of light in the image.

i realized that i may have driven under thealmost five lane wide craft.

later, i make mapped the area to verify that there is no solid looking structure mid-air on silver hill road and swann lane...The streetview of the rite aide on silver hill road day time image confirmed my beliefs.
content.summary: I was at a red light updating facebook status of being in rush hour traffic, did notice object in the sky.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: My daughter was driving down our road on 2/28/14 after picking me up from work and as we got a couple of houses away from ours we spotted a triangle hovering above some homes that are on the next street. it hovered there for a minute or so as we parked the car. we sat there and watched it for another 30-60 seconds then we got out of the car and just then it started to move with no noise over our house. i tried to take a picture of it with my cell phone camera but i lost it over the house before i could get the shot. it was a silvery metallic color with "ridged" sides and three bright led type lights on the corners on the bottom and a small white light near the back end. i had to run errands with my 2 sons which took about 1 hour and when we got home i looked up to see if i saw anything again just not believing what i had seen earlier again. i saw sirius and under it was an equally gig and bright white light. i thought it was strange and couldn't figure out what the light was when suddenly the bottom light started to move to the left/south. it was just a bright white light but lower than sirius was. three of my adult children also witnessed these two events with me.
content.summary: Two different ufo's witnessed within 60 minutes in the same area - one white light and one triangle

content.detailedDescription: On 2/26/14 i was inside the home that i work at when one of the ladies told me to come outside to see this light that she was watching for about 5 minutes that was stationary but kept changing colors. i watched for another 10 minutes while the light remained stationary but changed colors. it went from a solid red to a solid yellowish/orange and then to a bright white strobe-like white light. it changed the colors several times but did not have any type of pattern to it. it stayed still and then just disappeared. there was no noise that we could hear.
content.summary: Stationary light that changes from solid red to solid yellow-orange to strobing white witnessed for 15 minutes by two witnesses

content.detailedDescription:
While i was living in mountain ranch california. i viewed what i thought was a forest fire. after a few seconds of my mind racing .I realized it was some kind of craft. i stood there looking in amazement as the craft was less than 30 yards from me. some how this craft was flying over the trees with what look to be flames or a glow that it was like fire from the sun. i rain inside and woke up my friend pat. for some reason i went in yelling about a fire. although i new it was`nt a fire.Pat came running out to see the object. by no it had slowly moved over about 20 more yards. as pat came out he said what the f is going on. what is that. said i don`t know. we quickly decide to run over to the other house on the property and get my friend travis up to see this. we all climb into the truck and raced down the hill to see if we could still see the object.The object had moveddown about a hundred yards. the property that i was on was 200 hundred acres. the object was deciding into the valley on the botton half of the property. so we chased after it to see if we could catch another look.As we came down the road we could see that it was very close to the ground or had landed. it had what looked like reddish light on it. we all staired in amazement for a minute. then all at once we were struck with fear and got back into the truck and went home. 
 recently i have been going thru some of my photos of when i lived there. i have found some interesting things in the photos. it could be dust. but they have a certain shape and color, that is a little odd. also the objects do not show on certain photos taken on the same day. please look at photos. all photos were taken within minutes of each other. the structure seems to have a honey comb texture to the craft, when you view it up close
content.summary: I walk out side to get some air, i looked up and thought the trees were on fire. after a minute of panic i reallized it was a craft

content.detailedDescription:
I walked outside to my back patio about 9:15 pm on 12/31/13 (new year���s eve) and looked up at the sky. i immediately spotted a single light-orange orb in the southwest part of the sky moving northeast at a moderate rate of speed. it didn���t appear to be at a high altitude ��� maybe a couple of hundred feet above the ground (although i���m certainly not the best judge of distances). if i were to have held up my thumb, it would have been just a bit smaller than the size of my thumbnail. it passed to the west of me and i followed its path as it headed northeast until it disappeared.

it was extremely bright. i saw no blinking lights around it, as you see on planes. it had no form, like a plane, simply a brilliant ball of light. and, what struck me as the strangest thing of all, was that it was completely silent.

my husband and i spend many nights outside on the patio star-gazing. since we are very close to the flight path of louisville international airport, bowman field, and a tv station that has a helicopter landing pad, my husband and i are very familiar with all types of aircraft at all levels of altitude. even though we live relatively close to the city and the light pollution can sometimes be a problem, we can also spot satellites as they pass overhead.

despite our familiarity with the aircraft/spacecraft that fly over our home (we���ve lived here for 8 years), i couldn���t identify this as anything i���d ever seen in the past. i remember asking myself, ���what is that?��� when it had disappeared (after being visible to me for about 45 seconds), i walked back inside and mentioned to my husband that i���d just seen something that i���d never seen before in my life. i wondered silently to myself if i���d seen a ufo.

a few days later, while checking the internet, i found reports of people in california on new year���s eve spotting light orange orbs of light that were completely silent. i was stunned. i believe i saw exactly the same thing in louisville, ky. (end)
content.summary: Single bright light-orange orb flying silently over 40207 zip code @ 9:15 pm on 12/31/13.

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was in the woods raccoon hunting, i herd a hum that turned into a roar. then i saw a light flying erratically out of the out of the south it would ascend and then descend zigzagging across the sky. then to two more lights coming out of the north met up with the first light they hovered around 500 feet in the sky for around 20 to 25 minutes making a roaring humming sound then in a step pattern began shoot off to the north/northwest while gaining great altitude. afterwords the battery on my headlamp  was drained and my cell phone will not work. after the sighting i felt confused i've seen helicopters flight paths at night and there's no way a helicopter could fly like that. when i left the woods that night i put the experience in the back of my mine and tried to forget it, i've tried to convince my self that what i saw had some plausible explanation behind it but i realize after four years that keeping myself in denial was na���ve of me.
content.summary: I saw and herd objects in the sky will hunting one night

content.detailedDescription: I was waiting for a bus. i noticed green and red  lights shaped like a chopper but no sound-noise. then i saw another go in same direction,nw to se same as first. but i believe it was the same and only object. i saw it do a reverse of direction two times.Then i got on bus and asked the driver if he sees what i see i don`t know if he did or not. i had no feelings about this except that it had been a long time since my last sighting approx. 20yrs. prior. this helicopter looking object reversed  direction without stopping, making sound or circling.Thank you. ron
content.summary: Saw what i thought was a chopper, but it went into reverse., two times  and no sound, noise.

content.detailedDescription:
This is a google earth image; attached below.  

hundreds of objects look like identical flying birds with lights shining toward the ground.  all of the birds are flying in precisely the same direction. 

expand the image in google to see many more birds.  

in case you didn't get it, i found the image from approximately 1400 ft. at 33 04'29.15" n   97 32'21.02" w   

the date on the image was 4/10/13.

hope i'm not wasting your time.  i appreciate what you'll are doing.

jk
content.summary: Image is on google earth.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my house and heard my husband yelling for me to come outside, he then told me to look into the sky and there was a large glowing fireball-like object coming from the west. my son also witnessed the object. it seemed to slow down and then changed course and started moving north. was very large, about the size of a basketball in the sky from our observation point. it was just under the cloud cover and was very bright red/orange/yellow and pulsating. once the object changed course to the north it appeared to grow smaller, but we could still see that it was pulsating and grew even smaller as it traveled farther away. i then thought to ask my husband for his phone and videoed the object a short time, but after it was almost out of view. it then disappeared into the cloud cover. during the entire event it seemed to change speed and move faster and slower and pulsated the entire time. my husband states that before i came outside it was larger and he actually thought he was witnessing a plane crash because it looked like a huge fireball. i would say from the time my husband noticed the object until we could no longer see it was about 5 minutes.
content.summary: Witnessed a glowing fireball-like object moving from the west then change course and head north.

content.detailedDescription: At the time of the sighting i was in my bedroom lighing in my bed looking out the window at the stars when suddenly i saw a triangularly shaped object sillently float across the sky heading northbound the object was triangularly shaped and had three lights in each of the corners and a big light in the middle it did not do anything but silently float across the sky but i know for sure that it was not of human makeing
content.summary: Triangularly shaped object with four lights in each corner an one big light in the middle

content.detailedDescription: I was walking through the rain when i spotted a white ball above the phoenix mountain preserves. it hovered there for 15 seconds and i went under a tree which blocked view then it was gone. 2 other witneseed this ufo sighting.
content.summary: Small white ball of light

content.detailedDescription: Was driving on hwy 34 towards darlington, observed object reflecting sunlight. i pulled over on the side of the road, looked at object through binoculars . observed metallic object hovering, for about 2 minutes. while observing object another motorist  with passenger stopped and asked what i was looking at. i told them and looked again through binoculars and was unable to locate again. i than got back into my vehicle and drove about two more miles in the direction where object was observed and noticed clearly a commercial jet moving in a northern direction not reflecting light . this air plane was was not observed anywhere near the disc or anywhere in the vicinity. i am %100 percent positive was i initially observed was not the commercial jet.
content.summary: Observed object reflecting sunlight hovered than disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
The pictures were within eye sight of cabo san lucas harbor 
friday, may 18, 2012, 18:49 pm, (believed mst - times were 
not changed from pdt on arrival in baja). 

there were approximately 25 people in our businss group, i am not 
aware of anyone that viewed the sighting directly. i was the only 
one taking photos at this time of our outing, and took roughly 125 pictures during the entire trip.

while returning to port, i took a number of shots at sunset as we
passed "lands end". those with date in lower corner are from a htc 
cell phone, the last was taken with a canon slr.

the photos show glowing, disc/cigar shaped object/s to the left of 
our vessel. there are grey spots in cell phone shots; those are birds going to roost in the rocks. picture 5 from slr shows 2 glowig objects, and one looks to be right in front of the rock formation. this makes
it hard to determine how far away the object is in the "dated"
photos. 

had i been looking up, instead of the rocks and the ocean views, i 
most definately would have made sure to get more details and pictures.
i welcome reviews, and psibly be advised what i captured.
content.summary: Checked not a witness, i was not aware of sighting, until a photo album was looked at 03.01.14

content.detailedDescription:
on august 28 1993 at on or around 0:300-0:330 a ufo decended from the east on interstate 35 heading north in missouri.My daughter was riding shotgun to keep me awake.We had just purchased this brand new 1994 dodge conversion van in chattanooga tn.We were heading home to mn without stopping.My wife and son were asleep in the back on the bed.My daughter was scared,terrified.She asked me if we should wake mom and her brother.I said no.No sense in frightening them.This craft was persistant, it wove in and out of the trees.Side to side and up and down.Things began to get blurry,but i kept driving.The last time i looked at the clock in the van was around 0:330 in the morning. we were awoken by the sound of cows mooing in a pasture that we were facing. it was past 07:30.I know i didn't stop on my own accord.I would never let anyone climb over the maplewood console with a tv as i am very protective of my new vechicles.My wife was riding shotgun and my 16 year old daughter was in back.We lost around 4 hours in which we can't account for.Could someone tell me what happened?

                                   confused

   p.S.We had nothing but problems with the computer board in that vehicle.Other electricle problems too.I got rid of it.
content.summary: Disc that decended from the east and wove in and out of trees to follow us on i-35 in mo.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to work. driving towards broomfield , interlocken area and my final destination. when i noticed in the clear sky two rods hovering side by side. i keep driving to my destination. i knew that i would have good observation of the objects once i arrived at work. i arrived at work and these two objects were still visible.  i was in the parking lot facing east. i watched  these objects for at least 15 mins. there were no witnesses that i am aware of as i was alone in the parking lot. i had to clock in for work , so i had to leave the viewing site. this was my second encounter of the first kind. i could not believe what i was seeing.  however, i was still very excited to see these objects. i knew these objects were rods as i have seen pictures of these type of objects before.
content.summary: I was driving towards broomfield on my way to work. spotted two rods side by side while driving in my car.

content.detailedDescription: Leaving after visiting friends in gunbarrel. on way home. got to train tracks. a train was coming, boom gates came down. looked up while waiting for train to pass. i was sitting in my car. saw grey disc object hovering. watched this object for 5  mins. after train passed. boom gates raised up and i proceeded to go east on hwy 119 to longmont. i always look up at the sky  since ii was young. i know it was a ufo. this was my first ever sighting a and  i was very excited. this sighting proved my beliefs as a child. i lost sight of the object , was going in opposite direction  of object.
content.summary: Waiting at train crossing for train to pass. about to turn onto hwy 119. looked up and saw object.

content.detailedDescription: I've never reported this or really spoke much about it. it was probably nothing. but while watching the show last night, a few times a clip was shown with an object that looked a lot like what i saw. my family and i were camping at first landing state park, va, in july 2012. the camping ground faces the chesapeake beach side of virgina beach and is right next to the joint expeditionary base, fort story. around 10 a.M., i was walking up to the camp bath and washrooms and noticed what looked like a 50 gal. barrel hovering above the beach area closest to the base at a slight eastward angle. i ignored it figuring it was a kite or something, but then it stuck me as being unusual. i looked back up and stared at it for a few minutes. "what is that?" i said several times, each time trying to rationalize it as a balloon or kite. but it looked very solid and didn't move at all. if it were windy enough for a barrel-shapped kite to take flight, i would expect it to move or sway a bit. but it didn't. as i was staring at it, a guy walked by me, also heading to the bathroom. as he passed, i called out to him..."hey, what is that?" the guy looked up, stared a few moments,then simply said "i don't know" and kept walking. i continued to stare then saw two or three blackhawk helicopters take off and head toward the northwest. i said to myself they're going after whatever that is. as i continued toward the bathroom, i kept watching the object as it hovered motionlessly. the helicopters did a large westward loop. and i continued into the bathroom. i was in there maybe 5 mins. when i came back out it was gone. i don't recall if the helicopters were in the air or area when i came out. i returned to the campsite and jokingly told my wife i saw a ufo. i never saw it again while we were there and never quite saw anything like it again.
content.summary: Saw barrel-shapped object hoverning near military base

content.detailedDescription: I live on 106 avenue in sacramento california i was getting out of my car and i heard a strange noise and when i looked up i saw a very weird looking aircraft. i grabbed my cell phone to take a picture but i was shaking so hard at a sheer i couldn't get a shot of the first one,then all of a sudden another one came directly after it. i was able to get a picture of it. its small but i got it.This event happened at approximately 9 15 on february 28 2014.It was a very weird sound kinda like a rumbling, but it was silent i can't really explain it. i know one thing it freaked me out.Both aircraft flew completely over my apartment building.I am attaching a picture in the picture the arrow is my carport fort,the circle is the ufo, and the square is a regular star in the sky.I posted my picture on facebook, & a facebook friend referred me to this site and asked me to post my information which i am doing. thank you
content.summary: i was freaking out..I've never seen aircrafts like this in my etire life.

content.detailedDescription:
I had been observing a strange looking star for a few hours.  i was staying in a fifth wheel rv at my mom's that summer. suddenly,  i saw the "star" becoming large,  closer, more detailed,  without sound,  multiple lights flashing around the craft in a sequence.  it landed actress the field.  i had ran outside by this time.  
i couldn't believe my eyes,  it was exciting,  but the lights suddenly went out,  everything went dark. i became afraid and i quickly went back inside.  
i don't recall how that night ended.  very strange and awesome.
content.summary: I had been observing a strange looking star for a few hours.  i was staying in a fifth wheel rv at my mom's that sum

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on route 702 with my adult daughter. it was dark and we were headed opposite of 695. it appeared 3 times larger than a moon in the sky and i thought it was a meteor as it looked like it had a tail of light. it was traveling very fast and it looked like it was going to crash into the wooded area. it slowed down at the top of the trees and made a slight turn and the bright sphere turned into 3 smaller blue-green spheres that were in a diagonal straight line. after it turned into the 3 smaller spheres it appeared to "cloak" into the sky. i was unsure if i was really seeing what i thought i was, when my daughter looked over and said "mom, did you see that?". i said yes and i was glad she had seen it also.
content.summary: Saw large bright sphere w/ tail that turned slightly and formed 3 blue-green smaller lights.

content.detailedDescription:
My sighting happened during a lunar eclipse several years ago, at approximately 10pm.  i was outside on my porch, viewing the eclipse. the three crafts were shaped like a housefly and were white and translucent.  they were quite large in comparison to a regular airplane or jet.  they were very easy to see.  the night was clear, no rain, clouds, or fog. the crafts were flying in formation, very close together, side by side.  all of a sudden, the craft in the middle did a zig-zag sort of move and then it returned to formation.  there was absolutely no sound.  they came over from the north, flew straight by the moon, and disappeared over the trees heading south.

i was alone, so no one else saw the crafts but me.  i could hardly believe it!  very cool.  i stated above that my viewing happened in august, but it might have been october.  the year probably isn't correct either, but i know for sure there was a full lunar eclipse that night. i had written it down at the time of the sighting, but i can no longer find the information.
content.summary: 3 crafts flying silently in formation during lunar eclipse
